{"id":324105174,"lang":"cpp","time":"1 year, 8 months","timestamp":1586768498,"status_display":"Wrong Answer","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/324105174/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Contiguous Array","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int findMaxLength(vector<int>& nums) {\n        vector<int> cnt(200000,-1);\n        cnt[100000] = 0;\n        \n        int ans =0;\n        int curr = 100000;\n        for(int i = 0;i<nums.size();i++){\n            curr += (nums[i] == 1 ? 1 : -1);\n            if(cnt[curr] != -1){\n                ans = max(ans,i +1 + cnt[curr]);\n            }else{\n                cnt[curr] = i+1;\n            }\n        }\n        return ans;\n        \n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"contiguous-array"}
